original_title: Take Every Wave: The Life of Laird Hamilton
overview: This is the remarkable story of an American icon who changed the sport of big wave surfing forever. Transcending the surf genre, this in-depth portrait of a hard-charging athlete explores the fear, courage and ambition that push a man to greatnessâ€”and the cost that comes with it.
title: Take Every Wave: The Life of Laird Hamilton
